title: When will classes begin for freshers?
content: When will classes begin for freshers? Any idea? During counselling they told us it would begin from 7-14 august

comments.body: by 1st week of sept, welcome to PESU
Is this confirmed? They told you this?
not confirmed but very likely the way kcet counselling is going on
It seems like it can be done by the last week of August. Given the time frame, we can expect classes to start from the first week of September..
